item.title: The Infrastructure that enables the Internet
item.description: ← prev DISCLAIMER: THIS ARTICLE IS STILL ACTIVELY BEING WORKED ON There are a vast number of options for connecting to the internet; however, the basic premise remains the same: your end devices communicate with your ISP’s network, which in turn communicates with other providers’ networks.
